mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = this_week_monday THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS mon, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tue, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 2 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wed, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 3 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS thu, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 4 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fri, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 5 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sat, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(res_date) = DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 6 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sun FROM tbl_end_res, (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(NOW()) - 2) DAY) AS this_week_monday) AS week_start WHERE DATE(res_date) BETWEEN this_week_monday AND DATE_ADD(this_week_monday, INTERVAL 6 DAY);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RES_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d');
select count(*) AS 'MONTH', sum(case when QR_CONFIRM = 0 then 1 else 0 end) AS 'NOSHOW' from tbl_end_res where date_format(res_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m');
